title: Our God Is Living
text:
(Capo 2)
Verse 1
COur God is Gliving
Say, Hal-le-lu- Djah
He’s living Ain us
Say, Hal-le-lu- D-D7jah
We taste His Griches,
He is our Dportion.
AJust say, Oh A7Lord,
To taste and D-G-Dsee
Verse 2
We come together,
There’s nothing better.
For in the Spirit we are His family,
His living Body!
We just express Him.
Jesus is our reality.
Verse 3
COur God is Gliving,
He’s not a Dstatue,
Our God can Asee us,
our God can Dhear, D7too.
He’s not an Gidol
of gold or Dsilver,
AWe serve the A7God
who’s real and D-C-Dtrue!

title: Children’s Songbook
text:
Welcome! This is a simple, fast site for children’s songs with guitar chords.

Add a new file to the songs/ folder and it will appear below automatically.










Keep My Heart


with New Verse 2










Our God Is Living


Say Halleljuah!

title: Keep My Heart
text:
Verse 1
DLord, today, keep my heart,
Keep it all the Emday.
While I’m young, Em7keep my heart
A7Soft, dear Lord, I Dpray;
Lord, I would keep my heart through Gevery Emday
GSoft and open A7unto DYou.
Verse 2
Lord today, keep my mouth,
From complaining much.
Even when things are tough,
Never giving up.
Lord, I would not complain when things are hard
Give me Lord a happy heart.
